title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: 藏語 Tibetan Studies
text:
今年2025四月開始學習藏語，以下紀錄我所用到的學習資源和對我來説有用的學習方法。




要多聼每個字母的發音，邊聽邊大聲跟讀（一定要大聲，這樣容易記住也可以聽聽自己的發音對不對）
剛開始會感覺很難，特別是ང的發音，對我最有幫助的這個字母的發音解釋是 “sing” 裏面的 “-ng” 音 + a (nga)，多練就可以發對音了！
用到的資源： 1) 丹增南卓仁波切教的第 1 堂｜基礎藏語班

寫字母 (writing alphabets)



視頻
網站



基本拼音 | 臺大佛學數位圖書館
每天看一個藏語視頻 — 丹達讀逗4分鐘藏語教室 (can also be used for English speakers)

English sources: - Unit 1: The alphabet | Tibetan Language School




丹增南卓仁波切教的第二堂基礎藏語班

藏語四元音

title:
依然 Yiran
Denise Zheng, PhD
text:
我是依然。1998出生於紐約，小時候在福建長大，然後中學開始在美國讀書一直到快博士畢業。讀博最後一個學期的時候我決定開始旅居，2023年12月我先去了南美洲，然後4月到台灣并在臺南遠程完成社會心理學博士學位論文答辯。在台灣生活的日子讓我意識到我最喜歡在亞洲生活。因爲我的研究跟冥想和慈悲心相關，我開始想深入學習佛學，同時也在印度學藏語和辯經。我會在這個部落格記錄旅途中的聞思修，寫作和攝影。
Hello world. My name is Yiran. I’m a social psychologist and contemplative scientist (research meditation and compassion). I’m Chinese American, lived in China for 9 years and the US for more than 15 years. When I was finishing my PhD in 2024, I decided to live internationally, mostly in Asia. I like to take photographs of the moments that touched me and reflect on things I’m learning so I’m sharing them here.

title: how I built this blog
text:
Welcome to my new blog. Since I finished my doctoral degree, I haven’t been using R as much. So to keep using this skill, I thought I would create a blog using R in a way that is free and open-source. After some searches, I found that Quarto would be the best option.


Creating a blog with Quarto in 10 steps by Beatriz Milz, PhD
Creating a blog documentation by Quarto
The ultimate guide to starting a Quarto blog by Albert Rapp, PhD
Building a blog with Quarto by Isabella Velásquez
It is worth checking out the Github pages for each of the websites listed above as they contain the codes that can give you ideas on how to format your blog.



Andreas Handel, PhD’s blog
